title: Dow Chemical seeks to triple Africa revenue in five years

Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
NAIROBI, Oct 12 (Reuters) - Dow Chemical Co plans to triple its revenue from sub-Saharan Africa in the next five years and is investing in o...
